title: Create A FAQ List for Gibwork
content:
The FAQ list aims to provide clear and concise answers to potential questions that users may have about using our platform.

The FAQ should cover a wide range of topics including but not limited to:

  • Registration and account setup

  • Creating new bounties, questions, and tasks.

  • Submitting work on bounties, questions, and tasks.

  • Payment and transaction processes

Coordinate with the team to gather necessary insights on Discord: https://discord.gg/dhTszYHckD
requirements:
• Ensure each question is phrased clearly and concisely.

  • Answers should be informative and easy to understand.

  • Include relevant links or references to detailed guides or support resources where applicable.

  • Attention to detail and accuracy is important.
